summary: Admin V1 Operational Freeze (Moderation Freeze + Privacy Center Export History) testing completed. All backend tests passed. Frontend UI verified.
passed_tests: Effective settings fetch for freeze status (GET /api/system-settings/effective)
Approve endpoint returns 400/404 when freeze OFF and listing state invalid
Approve endpoint returns 423 (Locked) when freeze ON - VERIFIED
GDPR export history list (GET /api/v1/users/me/gdpr-exports) - includes requested_at, status, expires_at
GDPR export download for ready exports (GET /api/v1/users/me/gdpr-exports/{id}/download)
Admin System Settings UI - Freeze toggle, reason input, status badge visible
Admin Moderation Queue UI - No freeze banner when OFF, bulk buttons enabled
Privacy Center UI - Export Geçmişi tab, Yeni Export/Export Geçmişi tabs, consent settings
context_for_next_testing_agent: Moderation Freeze functionality is fully operational. Freeze toggle with reason persists correctly. Approve endpoint returns 423 when freeze is ON. GDPR Export History shows requested_at, status, expires_at fields. Download button is disabled when export is expired. No pending listings in queue during testing.

ui_verification.system_settings_page: Freeze toggle, reason input, status badge all visible
ui_verification.moderation_queue_page: No freeze banner when freeze OFF, queue shows 'All caught up'
ui_verification.privacy_center_page: Export Geçmişi tab functional, shows loading state and export data
